statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, disease, treatment_plan FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, disease FROM PatientData WHERE disease LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 40;
SELECT disease, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM PatientData GROUP BY disease ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM PatientData WHERE disease = 'Cancer' OR disease = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, CONCAT('Gender: ', gender) AS demographic_info FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, duration_hours FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, duration_hours FROM treatments ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id ORDER BY treatment_date DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_patients, gender FROM patients GROUP BY gender HAVING num_patients > 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT full_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT full_name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment FROM PatientDemographics JOIN PatientHealthRecords ON PatientDemographics.patient_id = PatientHealthRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY age ASC, full_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM Doctors WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 60 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%'

SELECT appointments.appointment_date, patients.patient_name, treatments.treatment_type FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN treatments ON appointments.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age, patient_name
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE condition='Diabetes' AND physician='Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, temperature FROM Patient JOIN VitalSigns ON Patient.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_id FROM MedicalHistory WHERE condition='Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT test_name, value, unit FROM LabResults WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY test_date;
